I do have to say that Ogniem i Mieczem is infinitely better than M&B or Warband. After playing this, I felt that I could not go back to Warband, even though I have only had Warband for about two weeks before getting this game. 

The only weakness of With Fire and Sword/Ogniem i Mieczem is the bugs. They are very few (about five of them) but there are no solutions for them, and one of them can ruin your game. I am speaking about the prisoner bug, when the game crashes every time you sell, capture, move or disband prisoners. I just got it, and I will have to see if reinstalling this game will help.
